channel.title: Advanced System Tray Control
channel.description:
ASTC component provides an easy way to enable your VB, VC++, C#, VB.NET, or other COM environment applications to put an icon in system tray area It supports many advanced features such as show balloons and anitmated icons.

ASTC consists of one object: TrayIcon object.

TrayIcon object provides the ability to put your icon in system tray. It supports show and hide your icon, a tooltip balloon pointing to your icon in system tray area,also supports animateing your icon in system tray,change the tooltip in run time and popup specified menu.
channel.copyright: Copyright © 2005 CprinGold Software. All rights reserved.

item.title: Track Popup menu
item.description: Track Popup menu so whenever your program lost focus the icon popup menu will be closed.

item.title: Show Hide your Icon
item.description: Show-Hide the icon in system Tray area.

item.title: Tool tip balloon
item.description: ASTC give your application the ability to show a tool tip balloon pointing to your icon in the system tray area,displaying on win9x.
